channel.title: TOS Page Question
channel.description:
This has nothing to do with moparisthebest TOS or moparscape TOS for future reference.
[b]My Question[/b]: What do you need to make a TOS? Do you need to like sign up for something or what... I have finally got a domain, but i'm keeping it private until it is ready.

item.title: TOS Page Question
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Sorry nator, Vermillion and his infinite wisdom didn’t disclose exactly what his question was pertaining too.

Read full topic

item.title: TOS Page Question
item.dc:creator: @Vermillion1 Vermillion™
item.description:
@Vermillion1 wrote:

Thanks moparisthebest

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:4, topic:158196”][quote author=nator123123 link=topic=215609.msg1879888#msg1879888 date=1194936555]
TOS: Terms of service.

Dude, I don’t get you. Making TOSs are VERY EASY. It’s basic stuff…
Use HTML to create one.
[/quote]

That’s absolutley ridiculous, you shouldn’t post shite like that before you read his post carefully.

Unfortunatley there is not a Terms of Service Generator where you input variables and out pops a 32 page Terms of Use Agreement. You could stop by the county Court and ask for some more information, or even contact your parents lawyer. Other than that you’d might just better copy someone elses and severly edit it.[/quote]
What the fuck dude…

Read full topic

item.title: TOS Page Question
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

HTML and a web scripting language of your choice with the ability to set and check cookies (maybe you could even use javascript?) I use php.

Read full topic

Dude, I don’t get you. Making TOSs are VERY EASY. It’s basic stuff…
Use HTML to create one.[/quote]

That’s absolutley ridiculous, you shouldn’t post shite like that before you read his post carefully.

Unfortunatley there is not a Terms of Service Generator where you input variables and out pops a 32 page Terms of Use Agreement. You could stop by the county Court and ask for some more information, or even contact your parents lawyer. Other than that you’d might just better copy someone elses and severly edit it.
